mapper.sql: t.id, t.member_card, t.did, b.name as dname, b.start_age, b.end_age, t.create_time
mapper.select:
select
from member_age_relation t inner join age_dict b on t.did=b.id and b.is_del=0 where member_card= #{memberCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into member_age_relation (member_card, did, create_time,creator) values (#{memberCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into member_age_relation
member_card,
did,
create_time,
creator,
#{memberCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{did,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update member_age_relation
member_card = #{memberCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
